mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA(qna_seq, user_id, qna_title, qna_content, qna_date, qna_category, qna_status) VALUES (qna_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, sysdate, #{qna_category}, '답변중')
mapper.select: SELECT QNA_SEQ, USER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, QNA_SEQ, USER_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, QNA_CATEGORY, QNA_STATUS FROM QNA ORDER BY RN ASC) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_REPLY(QNA_REPLY_SEQ, QNA_SEQ, USER_ID, QNA_REPLY_CONTENT, QNA_REPLY_DATE) VALUES (qna_reply_seq.nextval, #{qna_seq}, #{user_id}, #{qna_reply_content}, sysdate)
